import Header from "../main/header"; import Footer from "../main/footer"; export default function Bin() { const [cartItems, setCartItems] = useState([ { id: 1, name: 'Товар 1', description: 'Описание товара 1', price: 1000, image: require('../img/ozu.jpeg') }, { id: 2, name: 'Товар 2', description: 'Описание товара 2', price: 2000, image: require('../img/profile_avatar.jpg') } ]); return ( <>
